docs: The Lazor Kit program provides smart wallet functionality with passkey authentication

instructions.name: add_whitelist_rule_program
docs: Add a program to the whitelist of rule programs

accounts.name: new_smart_wallet_authenticator
docs: Optional new authenticator to initialize when requested in message

accounts.name: old_rule_program
docs: CHECK

accounts.name: new_rule_program
docs: CHECK

accounts.name: ix_sysvar
docs: CHECK

accounts.name: authenticator_program
docs: Rule program for optional policy enforcement at commit time

accounts.name: cpi_commit
docs: New commit account (rent payer: payer)

instructions.name: create_smart_wallet
docs: Create a new smart wallet with passkey authentication

accounts.name: whitelist_rule_programs
docs: Whitelist of allowed rule programs

accounts.name: smart_wallet
docs: The smart wallet PDA being created with random ID

docs: Smart wallet configuration data

accounts.name: smart_wallet_authenticator
docs: Smart wallet authenticator for the passkey

accounts.name: config
docs: Program configuration

accounts.name: default_rule_program
docs: Default rule program for the smart wallet

accounts.name: cpi_commit
docs: Commit to execute. Closed on success to refund rent.

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the program by creating the sequence tracker

accounts.name: signer
docs: The signer of the transaction, who will be the initial authority.

accounts.name: config
docs: The program's configuration account.

accounts.name: whitelist_rule_programs
docs: The list of whitelisted rule programs that can be used with smart wallets.

accounts.name: default_rule_program
docs: The default rule program to be used for new smart wallets.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program.

instructions.name: update_config
docs: Update the program configuration

accounts.name: authority
docs: The current authority of the program.

accounts.name: config
docs: The program's configuration account.

errors.name: PasskeyMismatch
errors.msg: Passkey public key mismatch with stored authenticator

errors.name: SmartWalletMismatch
errors.msg: Smart wallet address mismatch with authenticator

errors.name: AuthenticatorNotFound
errors.msg: Smart wallet authenticator account not found or invalid

errors.name: Secp256r1InvalidLength
errors.msg: Secp256r1 instruction has invalid data length

errors.name: Secp256r1InstructionNotFound
errors.msg: Secp256r1 instruction not found at specified index

errors.name: InvalidSignature
errors.msg: Invalid signature provided for passkey verification

errors.name: ClientDataInvalidUtf8
errors.msg: Client data JSON is not valid UTF-8

errors.name: ChallengeMissing
errors.msg: Challenge field missing from client data JSON

errors.name: TimestampTooOld
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the past

errors.name: TimestampTooNew
errors.msg: Message timestamp is too far in the future

errors.name: RuleProgramNotWhitelisted
errors.msg: Rule program not found in whitelist

errors.name: WhitelistFull
errors.msg: The whitelist of rule programs is full.

errors.name: RuleDataRequired
errors.msg: Rule data is required but not provided

errors.name: RuleProgramsIdentical
errors.msg: Old and new rule programs are identical

errors.name: NoDefaultRuleProgram
errors.msg: Neither old nor new rule program is the default

errors.name: CpiDataMissing
errors.msg: CPI data is required but not provided

errors.name: InvalidCpiData
errors.msg: CPI data is invalid or malformed

errors.name: InsufficientRuleAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for rule instruction

errors.name: InsufficientCpiAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient remaining accounts for CPI instruction

errors.name: AccountSliceOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Account slice index out of bounds

errors.name: SolTransferInsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: SOL transfer requires at least 2 remaining accounts

errors.name: NewAuthenticatorMissing
errors.msg: New authenticator account is required but not provided

errors.name: NewAuthenticatorPasskeyMissing
errors.msg: New authenticator passkey is required but not provided

errors.name: TransferAmountOverflow
errors.msg: Transfer amount would cause arithmetic overflow

errors.name: InvalidBumpSeed
errors.msg: Invalid bump seed for PDA derivation

errors.name: CredentialIdTooLarge
errors.msg: Credential ID exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: RuleDataTooLarge
errors.msg: Rule data exceeds maximum allowed size

errors.name: CpiDataTooLarge
errors.msg: CPI data exceeds maximum allowed size

types.name: AuthenticatorAdded
docs: Event emitted when a new authenticator is added

types.name: ConfigUpdated
docs: Event emitted when program configuration is updated

types.name: CpiCommit
docs: Commit record for a future CPI execution.
Created after full passkey + rule verification. Contains all bindings
necessary to perform the CPI later without re-verification.

fields.name: owner_wallet
docs: Smart wallet that authorized this commit

fields.name: data_hash
docs: sha256 of CPI instruction data

fields.name: accounts_hash
docs: sha256 over ordered remaining account metas plus `target_program`

fields.name: authorized_nonce
docs: The nonce that was authorized at commit time (bound into data hash)

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix expiration timestamp

fields.name: rent_refund_to
docs: Where to refund rent when closing the commit

types.name: ErrorEvent
docs: Event emitted for errors that are caught and handled

types.name: FeeCollected
docs: Event emitted when a fee is collected

types.name: ProgramInitialized
docs: Event emitted when program is initialized

types.name: ProgramPausedStateChanged
docs: Event emitted when program is paused/unpaused

types.name: RuleProgramChanged
docs: Event emitted when a rule program is changed

types.name: SecurityEvent
docs: Event emitted for security-related events

types.name: SmartWalletAuthenticator
docs: Account that stores authentication data for a smart wallet

fields.name: passkey_pubkey
docs: The public key of the passkey that can authorize transactions

fields.name: smart_wallet
docs: The smart wallet this authenticator belongs to

fields.name: credential_id
docs: The credential ID this authenticator belongs to

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

types.name: SmartWalletConfig
docs: Data account for a smart wallet

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier for this smart wallet

fields.name: rule_program
docs: Optional rule program that governs this wallet's operations

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation

types.name: SmartWalletCreated
docs: Event emitted when a new smart wallet is created

types.name: SolTransfer
docs: Event emitted when a SOL transfer occurs

types.name: TransactionExecuted
docs: Event emitted when a transaction is executed

types.name: WhitelistRuleProgramAdded
docs: Event emitted when a whitelist rule program is added

types.name: WhitelistRulePrograms
docs: Account that stores whitelisted rule program addresses

fields.name: list
docs: List of whitelisted program addresses

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for PDA derivation
